inclusion.criterion: PAD defined as an ABI ≤0.9 or >1.3 in patients with low serum HDL cholesterol levels (<45mg/dL in men, <55 mg/dL in women)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Elevated liver enzymes (above 2 times the normal level)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Skeletal muscle myopathy or elevated serum CK levels
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Allergy or hypersensibility to either statins or nicotinic acid
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a family history of CAD, but no other cardiovascular risk factors such as smoking, high blood pressure, and diabetes mellitus. He is physically active.
